marketplaces.description: Official Anthropic-managed directory of high quality Claude Code plugins — LSPs, productivity tools, and integrations
An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works
UI/UX design intelligence with 67 styles, 96 palettes, 57 font pairings, 25 charts, and 13 stack guidelines
Production-ready workflow orchestration with 73 plugins, 112 agents, and 146 skills
AI-powered task management with intelligent orchestration, complexity analysis, and automated coordination
Persistent memory system for Claude Code — context compression across sessions
Battle-tested agents, skills, hooks, commands, and rules from an Anthropic hackathon winner
Access thousands of AI prompts and skills directly in your coding assistant
